name: Arcane Defense
description:
Game is maded by two Careeria student Jani and Erond, game is a topdown and its about wizard fighting bad wizard and monsters. Your job is to survive as long as you can. 

How to play:

WASD to move

Left click to cast rockwall to defend yourself

Right click to cast meteor strike to damage enemies

Mouse to look around 

Esc for menu
